籤詩版本二:
Labarin daga sararin sama yana da wuyar fahimta sosai. Kada ku yi tsammanin yawa.
Da a ce za ku niƙa dutse a madubi, da kun san cewa ƙoƙarinku a banza ne.
詩意:
Wannan hexagram yana kiyaye hoton kwanciyar hankali akai-akai.
Tsare kanka a cikin komai zai kawo sa'a.
解曰: Dabaru iri-iri. Ƙoƙarin ɓarna. Zai fi kyau zama masu ra'ayin mazan jiya. Menene dalili?
籤詩故事一:
◇Yarinyar Ginger mai neman miji
A lokacin daular Qin, lokacin da Meng Jiangnu ya kasance sarki na farko na daular Qin, a daren aurenta, an kama mijinta Fan Qiliang (Wan Xiliang) aka tura shi gina babbar katangar. Meng Jiangnu ta yi tafiyar dubban miliyoyi don aika wa mijinta tufafi masu dumi, an dauki lokaci mai tsawo kafin ta isa gawar, amma a karshe aka gaya mata cewa mijinta ya mutu, an binne gawarsa a karkashin babbar katangar. Meng Jiangnu ta fashe da kuka, kuma babbar katangar ta ruguje, an kuma gano gawar mijinta dauke da jini na digowa a kan tulin kasusuwa. Don haka Qin Shihuang ya kira Meng Jiangnu, wanda ya gigice har ya so ya dauki Meng Jiangnu a matsayin kuyangi. Ta yi mubaya'a ga Fan Qiliang, Meng Jiangnu ta rike gawar mijinta a wurin ibadar Meng Jiangnu a yau, inda ya jefa kansa cikin teku nan take.
聖意: Tsaron gida, kiyaye kai, dukiya, kasuwanci, aure, rashin jituwa, mata masu tafiya a ƙasar Liujia, guraben motsi, tsutsotsi, dabbobi, asarar dabbobi, wahalar neman mutane, ƙararraki, asarar dukiya, rashin lafiya, kayan aiki, aikawa zuwa ga Anshan kabari, nagode
